title: 10 משרות הייטק חדשות וחמות עבורכם
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

קרדיט תמונה: Getty Images Israel
אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
– Interactions with customers and partners to capture and understand requirements and needs.
– Involvement in the entire life cycle (conception, design, development, release, and post-release activities).
– Managing strategic planning, product vision and roadmap.
– Managing and driving the product’s user experience.
– Collaborating with different functional groups to support sales and marketing activities;
– Working closely with multiple development teams to articulate market needs and opportunities, translating them into technical requirements, and oversee their effective implementation.
Requirements:
– 5+ years’ experience in senior product management roles in the web domain, with proven record of taking a product through its full cycle.
– Proven experience with WEBINT, Social Listening or Social analytics products.
– Experience in delivering On-Premise and cloud solutions.
– Experience in managing Product, UX and Data Science resources.
– Proven ability to work effectively with different functional groups, including management, R&D and sales.
– Excellent interpersonal communication and negotiation skills to resolve internal and external competing priorities.
– Ability to manage multiple priorities, juggling multiple activities, simultaneously.
– Strong technical, analytical and problem solving skills.
– Experience with user interface and experience design.
– Willingness to travel to customer and non-customer sites globally (25%).
To send a CV for the position of Head of Product- Social Platform – AGT International
Payoneer is searching for a highly creative Senior Product Writer who is passionate about writing and understands the important role that great copy/content plays in user experience. In this exciting role you will be a central resource supporting the product team and your work will be seen by millions of customers every single day.
– Partner with product managers, internal business stakeholders and functional teams to define content requirements and strategy that best achieve business goals.
– Provide feedback to UX design team to ensure content meets business objectives/ user needs.
– Write and edit content that meets project goals and encourages the customer to take action.
– Collaborate on the creation of systems to tag and organize new and existing content
– Work with other departments as needed to ensure the content strategy is effectively implemented across channels.
– Collaborate on the development of content style guides, content and messaging strategies, best practices and processes.
– Partner with other writers within the organization to leverage and share ideas and make recommendations that apply broadly across multiple channels.
– Review analytics on an ongoing basis to understand user behavior and shape content/ messaging strategies.
– Evaluate the usability of new and existing products, and make constructive suggestions for change.
Requirements:
– BA or MA in English, Journalism, Technical Writing or equivalent.
– 5+ years creating online/digital content.
– Superior writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
– Excellent leadership, communication and teamwork skills.
– Must have a diverse portfolio of work.
– Experience working on a large-scale technology platform.
– A proven track record collaborating on projects to translate complex concepts into easy-to-understand interactive experiences.
– Extensive experience planning for and developing useful, usable content including instructional text, error and confirmation messages, automated emails, etc.
– Passion for creating great user experiences with actionable knowledge of the digital landscape including current industry and user trends, emerging technologies, and standards.
– Ability to scope, organize and execute multiple projects with interrelated goals
Experience in fin-tech a plus!
To send a CV for the position of Senior UX Writer – Payoneer
AnyClip is looking for a freelance video editor that will handle ongoing work. You will be working with high-end ads mixed with premium content and fast turnarounds. You will also be working with other editors that have experience in this field.
What You’ll do:
– Create high-end video ads for global brands.
– Combine content from different content sources.
– Search vast libraries of footage for the most engaging scenes.
– Work with legally-licensed premium content libraries.
Requirements:
– A person with excellent technical skills in video editing software (Avid, premiere, etc.).
– Possess vast knowledge in the film industry, sports and pop culture.
– Technical oriented.
– Delivery-minded individual with experience in working with tight deadlines.
– Understanding of creative advertising and global trends in adtech.
To send a CV for the position of Video Editor – AnyClip
Como is scaling up, and we’re looking for a talented and ambitious Technical Integrations Engineer to support the company’s growth as part of the integrations team.
As Technical Integrations Manager, you will work closely with the R&D, product, and business teams as you lead the integration of international POS companies with Como’s API.
Requirements:
– Technically integrate POS partners around the world with Como’s API – from initial intro, through technical integration, to ongoing support and upgrades.
– Configuration, verification, and troubleshooting in lab and prod environments.
– Master our flagship “ComoSens” product and API inside and out.
– Understand business and POS needs to constantly improve the product and turn requirements into action items.
– Turn strategy and roadmap into actionable features within the API.
– Maintain great relationships with our partners.
– Execute ongoing post-implementation tests.
– Handle acceptance tests and handover to customer.
– Manage multiple projects independently and on time.
To send a CV for the position of Technical Integration Engineer – Como
We are looking for a person that has analytical, technical and business skills to turn data into marketing insights.
– You will be a valuable member of an incredible team that simply can’t say no to a challenge.
– You will initiate and provide analytical services and insights to our marketing team.
– You will support the marketing business processes through reports and segmentations using multi million record tables.
– You will be responsible for defining, developing, executing and optimizing complex SQL\Big data queries and stored procedures for both analysis and operational purposes.
Requirements:
– Native English Speaker – a MUST.
– BA in Communications, Journalism, English or related field – a MUST.
– 1+ years’ experience as a content manager – a MUST.
– Experience with Google analytics- major advantage.
– Able to multi-task and meet tight deadlines.
– Strong eye for detail, organizational requirements, and time management skills.
– Team player but also an independent worker who is proactive.
– Able to work in a dynamic environment.
To send a CV for the position of Marketing Data Analyst – Amdocs
לצוות תשתיות TERADATA דרוש DBA בעל נסיון של 3 שנים לפחות כ- DBA Teradata\SQL Server\Oracle, בעל ראיה רחבה, הבנת תהליכים ארגוניים, ויכולת ניהול עצמית ולמידה גבוהים.
הצוות בו ישתלב נותן שירות לעשרות תכניתנים וכן אחראי על כל הפעילות הייצורית המתרחשת מול  מחסן הנתונים. מחסן נתונים ארגוני מבוסס TERADATA הינו מערכת קריטית ומרכזית המספקת שירותים ל עשרות לקוחות פנימיים, וכן בסיס למתן שירות ללקוחות הבנק.
במסגרת תפקידו ידרש לטפל בכל נושאי אדמיניסטרציה ותחזוקה של מסדי הנתונים במחסן נתונים מבוסס TERADATA, שיפורי ביצועים של שאילתות ותמיכה במשתמשים.
התפקיד מצריך זמינות ומענה טלפוני לתקלות.
דרישות:
– נסיון של 3 שנים כ-DBA Teradata\SQL Server\Oracle
– שליטה מלאה ב SQL
– ניתוח שאילתות ושיפור ביצועים
– נכונות להתמקצע בתחום ה- Teradata
– נסיון עבודה במערכת הפעלה Linux
– היכרות והבנת שירותי רשת DNS \ AD \ LDAP
– ידע בכתיבת סקריפטי  shell – יתרון
– אחריות, מקצועיות, עצמאות וניהול עצמי בדגש על הובלת משימות מורכבות
– יכולת למידה מהירה של נושאים חדשים
– יחסי אנוש ועבודה בצוות
– מודעות לצרכי לקוחות ושירותיות
– זמינות טלפונית ומענה לתקלות מחוץ לשעות פעילות וע”פ דרישה
To send a CV for the position of DBA – Matrix
Check Point is searching for a HW Appliances Project Manager:
– Managing the releases of new HW appliances & accessories from definition process (SRS) to field support.
– Managing new requirements and enhancements for existing HW and SW products.
– Coordinating multi-channels 3rd party external vendors (ODMs), logistics, SW/HW groups, QA and highest executives.
– Working in a diverse and demanding environment.
Requirements:
– Degree in Electrical/ Computer engineering.
– 3+ years of experience as a Project Manager.
– 2+ years background in computer hardware design/network protocols/performance critical systems – Advantage.
– Management of overseas sub-contractors experience – Advantage.
To send a CV for the position of Hardware Project Manager – Check Point
We are seeking a highly motivated, super passionate and experienced English Web Writer/Editor to join our magic wielding Content Team, bringing the sharpest editorial skillset and the most creative writing abilities.
– Produce new, quality content.
– Edit submitted content, turning it from good to amazing.
– Maintain websites and ensure proofed, clean, accurate information, on an ongoing basis.
– Create compelling copy and microcopy for websites and online interactions.
– Write copy for all textual formats – articles, infographics, videommercials, etc.
– Manage third-party content contributors – outlining briefs, monitoring quality, editing and ensuring timely submission.
– Prioritize tasks, factoring in business and brand objectives.
– Liaison with internal departments.
Requirements:
– Native English speakers only.
– At least 3 years of experience writing and editing for an English-language website or online magazine/newspaper.
– Familiarity with online content metrics.
– Web savviness and an eye for a good story.
– Team spirit, creativity, passion and energy are a must.
To send a CV for the position of English Web Writer/Editor – Natural Intelligence
גיקטיים, אתר תוכן לקהילת הסטארטאפים וההון סיכון, מתרחב ומגייס איש/אשת מכירות שיצטרף/תצטרף לצוות שלנו.
אנחנו מחפשים אנשים שיודעים ליצור קשרים חדשים, חרוצים ובעלי ראש גדול ומוטיבציה ללמוד.
אוריינטציה טכנולוגית וניסיון קודם – יתרון גדול. יכולת עבודה בצוות – חובה.
– צירת שת”פים עם מגוון חברות טכנולוגיה.
– גיוס ספונסרים לאירועים וכנסים.
– כתיבת הצעות מחיר, מענה ללקוחות במייל ובטלפון.
דרישות:
– רצון ללמוד על עולם הטכנולוגיה
– 4-5 שנות נסיון
– ראש פתוח ויכולת למידה
– ניסיון ורצון לעבוד בצוות
– משרה מלאה
To send a CV for the position of איש/אשת מכירות למחלקה המסחרית בגיקטיים – Geektime
We are looking for an experienced and passionate individual to join our Windows Endpoint team. Our collection technology uses advanced C++ techniques to gather and analyze low-level (kernel and user-space) information, on which we build our disruptive solution for stopping advanced cyber-threats.
In this position you will:
– Write software that can reach the depths of the operating system.
– Optimize for extreme performance constraints while keeping a high frequency of sampling.
– Research uncharted territories of the OS API and internals mechanisms.
Requirements:
– At least 2 years of experience in relevant software development.
– Mastery of C++ (proven experience focusing on system-level windows).
– Firm understanding of the inner workings of Windows architecture, memory management, processes and libraries.
– Relevant military background/BSc from a known university – advantage.
– Firm understanding of security concepts – advantage.
– The ability to independently take a feature through the entire cycle – from conception and definition, through design, implementation and testing, and until successful release to production.
To send a CV for the position of C++ Windows Developer – Cybereason
keywords: head of product- social platform,agt international,senior ux writer,payoneer,video editor,anyclip,technical integration engineer,como,marketing data analyst,amdocs,dba,matrix,hardware project manager,check point,איש/אשת מכירות למחלקה המסחרית בגיקטיים,geektime,english web writer/editor,natural intelligence,c++ windows developer,cybereason,גיק ג\'יב,גיקגו\'ב,דרושים,מהנדסים,מנהלים,משרות,משרות בהיי-טק
